algorithm: In the new algorithm, the scores for the bins are calculated by dividing the rest capacity of each bin by the maximum capacity and multiplying it by the exponential of the negative value of the item size, then subtracting the logarithm of the sum of the remaining capacities of all the bins.
code:
import numpy as np
import math

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    rest_capacity = max_capacity - bins
    rest_capacity_sum = np.sum(rest_capacity)
    scores = (rest_capacity / max_capacity) * np.exp(-item) - np.log(rest_capacity_sum)
    return scores
